titles: XII. mery iests, of the wyddow Edyth this lying widow, false and craftie, late i[n] Engla[n]d, hath deceiued many ... Now newly printed, this present yeare, for such as delite, mery iests for to here.
author: Smith, Walter, fl. 1525.
notes: Printer's name and address from colophon.
Running title reads: XII. mery iestes of the vviddovv Edith.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
keywords: England --  Social life and customs --  Humor --  Poetry --  Early works to 1800.
